header.title: FastiShare - Fast. File Sharing
header.description: A simple, fast way to share files between devices on the same network - no internet required.

step1.title: Connect Devices to Network
step1.subtitle: Make sure all devices—whether it's your phone, PC, or both phones—are connected to the same local Wi-Fi network for proper communication.

step2.title: Launch FastiShare
step2.subtitle: Open the FastiShare app and ensure the server is running on your device.

step3.title: Access Server URL
step3.subtitle: Visit the server URL in your browser or scan the displayed QR code to connect to the server.

step4.title: Send Files
step4.subtitle: Choose the files you want to send or receive. You can also drag and drop files directly into the browser for easy upload. Once uploaded, the files will be available for download.

step5.title: Download Files
step5.subtitle: To download, simply click the download icon in your browser to start the file transfer.

step6.title: Stop Server
step6.subtitle: Once you're done with the transfer, stop the server to finish the session.

bottomCard.title: Pro Tips
bottomCard.step1: All transfers are local and temporary
bottomCard.step2: For fastest speeds, use 5GHz Wi-Fi when available
bottomCard.step3: Keep both devices awake during transfer

header.title: Behind FastiShare
header.description: Understanding how your files stay private and transfer quickly

step1.title: Local Server Technology
step1.description: FastiShare creates a temporary web server on your device that other devices on the same network can access.

step2.title: Wi-Fi Network Only
step2.description: Files never leave your local network - no internet required and no cloud storage.

step3.title: Secure Transfers
step3.description: Only devices connected to your Wi-Fi can access the files you share

step4.title: Two-Way Transfers
step4.description: Any device can become a sender or receiver - switch roles instantly

bottomCard.title: Technical Details
bottomCard.description: When you share files, other devices connect directly to your phone like they would connect to any website, but everything stays completely within your local network.

step1.title: Local IP Address:
step1.description: Your device acts as a server using its local network IP

step2.title: Temporary Storage:
step2.description: Files are kept in memory and deleted after transfer

step3.title: Connection Types:
step3.description: Works with any Wi-Fi network (2.4GHz or 5GHz)

step4.title: No Internet Needed:
step4.description: Works even without an active internet connection

header.title: FastiShare Troubleshooting
header.description: Solutions to common problems when sharing files locally

step1.title: Devices can't see each other
step1.description:
• Ensure both devices are on the same Wi-Fi network
• Restart the FastiShare app on both devices
• Try turning Wi-Fi off and on again

step2.title: Connection drops during transfer
step2.description:
• Move devices closer to the router
 • Avoid network-intensive activities during transfer
 • Switch to 5GHz band if available

step1.title: Files won't upload
step1.description:
• Check available storage space
 • Verify file permissions
 • Try smaller files first to test

step2.title: Download gets stuck
step2.description:
• Pause and resume the download
 • Check receiver's storage space
 • Ensure sender device stays awake

step1.title: QR code not scanning
step1.description:
• Clean your camera lens
 • Ensure good lighting
 • Hold device steady for 2-3 seconds

step2.title: App crashes or freezes
step2.description:
• Update to the latest version
 • Clear app cache (Settings > Apps > FastiShare)
 • Reinstall the app if needed
